smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'ConverterPresenter' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
File 'Parcelable.kt' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onKeyDown appears to be too complex.

smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: parent.getItemAtPosition(position) cannot be safely cast to Measure.
parent.getItemAtPosition(position) cannot be safely cast to Measure.
displayView.getOverlay() cannot be safely cast to ViewGroupOverlay.
view.findViewById(R.id.text1) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
view.findViewById(R.id.text1) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
v.getTag() cannot be safely cast to Int.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: au.id.rlac.util.android.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: RedundantVisibilityModifierRule
smells.description: Checks for redundant visibility modifiers. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

instances.message: unitConverter is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
changeTo is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
changeFrom is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
appendDigit is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
appendDec is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
clear is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
swap is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
NucleusHelper is explicitly marked as public. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.
presenter is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
create is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
resume is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
pause is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
destroy is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
save is explicitly marked as public. Functions are public by default so this modifier is redundant.
BaseFragment is explicitly marked as public. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (arguments.getInt("unitConverter")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: arguments.getInt("unitConverter")
Parentheses around the lambda ({ it.key }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (isJellyBeanMR1 && getParentFragment().isRemovingOrParentRemoving()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: isJellyBeanMR1 && getParentFragment().isRemovingOrParentRemoving()

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'nucleus.factory.RequiresPresenter' is unused.
The import 'android.annotation.SuppressLint' is unused.
The import 'au.id.rlac.util.nucleus.NucleusHelper' is unused.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
